config.siddhiApp: @App:name('TwitterAnalytics') @App:description('Twitter Analytics using Twitter Extension') define stream SentimentTypestream(count long,id long ,timestamp string,CDate string, TweetID string, value int, type string, country string , hashtags string, mentions string); @Store(type="rdbms",datasource="Twitter_Analytics") define aggregation TweetAggregation from SentimentTypestream select count() as tweetCount, avg(value) as avgEmotionsIndex aggregate by timestamp every sec ... year;

queryData.query: from TweetAggregation within {{from}}L, {{to}}L per "{{per}}s" select AGG_TIMESTAMP, tweetCount
